name: Emspoma Water-Resistent Massage Emulsion 300 gram
descr:
The range of time-proven EMSPOMA massage products now features another special product - EMSPOMA special „S” OUTDOOR.
 
 
Emspoma Outdoor is suitable for cold, wet and rainy weather for cycling, football, running, climbing, hiking, rowing, water sports, diving, etc. at low water and air temperatures. Compared with conventional Emspoma products it has clear hydrophobic (water repellent) properties. After application (massage, self-massage) this emulsion creates a film on the skin, which prevents the skin from getting cold. This emulsion is designed for
both massages as well as for spotting prior to massage only in cases when we want to protect the skin from the adverse effects of weather influences (especially cold and water or exposure to wet and cold weather).
 
Dermatologicaly tested. Effect on the skin: Neutral pH-value.
 
Also available in 500 gram version.
